mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_title, menu_link, menu_ico, menu_level, menu_pid, menu_alt, menu_createuser, menu_createtime, menu_lastmodify,menu_order
mapper.select: select * from power_system_menu order by menu_order asc

SELECT distinct m1.*FROM ( SELECT m.manager_id,men.*FROM power_manager m LEFT JOIN power_manger_role_rf rf on m.manager_id=rf.rf_mangerid INNER JOIN power_role_menu_rf mrf on rf.rf_roleid=mrf.rmrf_roleid INNER JOIN power_system_menu men on mrf.rmrf_menuid=men.menu_id WHERE m.manager_id=#{managerid} ) t,power_system_menu m1 WHERE t.menu_id=m1.menu_id or m1.menu_id=t.menu_pid
mapper.insert: insert into power_system_menu (menu_id, menu_title, menu_link, menu_ico, menu_level, menu_pid, menu_alt, menu_createuser, menu_createtime, menu_lastmodify,menu_order) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuAlt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{menuLastmodify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{menu_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},)

mapper.update:
update power_system_menu
menu_title = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_link = #{menuLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_ico = #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_pid = #{menuPid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_alt = #{menuAlt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_createuser = #{menuCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menu_createtime = #{menuCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
menu_lastmodify = #{menuLastmodify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
menu_order = #{menu_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update power_system_menu set menu_title = #{menuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_link = #{menuLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_ico = #{menuIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_level = #{menuLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_pid = #{menuPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_alt = #{menuAlt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_createuser = #{menuCreateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_createtime = #{menuCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, menu_lastmodify = #{menuLastmodify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
